Uses of Class
io.atomix.cluster.ClusterConfig

  • Packages that use ClusterConfig 
    Package Description
    io.atomix.cluster
    Provides classes and interfaces for cluster management.
    io.atomix.core
    Core APIs for managing Atomix clusters and operating on distributed primitives.

    • Uses of ClusterConfig in io.atomix.cluster

      Methods in io.atomix.cluster that return ClusterConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClusterConfig ClusterConfig.setLocalNode(NodeConfig localNode)
      Sets the local node configuration.
      ClusterConfig ClusterConfig.setMulticastAddress(Address multicastAddress)
      Sets the multicast address.
      ClusterConfig ClusterConfig.setMulticastEnabled(boolean multicastEnabled)
      Sets whether multicast is enabled.
      ClusterConfig ClusterConfig.setName(String name)
      Sets the cluster name.
      ClusterConfig ClusterConfig.setNodes(Collection<NodeConfig> nodes)
      Sets the cluster nodes.

    • Uses of ClusterConfig in io.atomix.core

      Methods in io.atomix.core that return ClusterConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClusterConfig AtomixConfig.getClusterConfig()
      Returns the cluster configuration.
      Methods in io.atomix.core with parameters of type ClusterConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AtomixConfig AtomixConfig.setClusterConfig(ClusterConfig cluster)
      Sets the cluster configuration.
